system.requirement: Your ravens provide sight and insight.

abilities.description: Fara ok Sja: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ac19f4c7f3fe31be]{Undertake a Journey} to follow one marked by death or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information} about them by sending your ravens out to scry, you may roll +shadow (instead of +wits).

Sala Sjon: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by having your ravens gaze into a person's soul, roll +shadow. On a hit, you see one of that person's darkest fears. On a miss, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (1 stress) from a chaotic vision of your own fears.

Doudar-Ord: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c0967ba47f57393b]{Draw the Circle} and choose To the death as a boast, take +2 momentum (instead of +1). In addition, take +2 momentum (instead of +1) when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} and choose Embrace the pain during the battle.
